auth.signInDescription: Please sign in with your Google account to view your stock portfolio from Google Sheets.
auth.signInHelp: You'll be redirected to Google to authorize access to your spreadsheet.
auth.pleaseSignInAgain: Please try logging in again or check your Google API credentials.

errors.failedToFetchFromSheets: Failed to fetch data from Google Sheets

missingAuthCode.title: Missing Authorization Code
missingAuthCode.description: The OAuth callback did not receive an authorization code.
checks: Your redirect URI is correctly configured in Google Cloud Console
The GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID and GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET are set in your .env file

authFailed.title: Authentication Failed
checks: Your Google Cloud Console credentials are correct
Google Sheets API is enabled in your project
